name: Modern Man Championship
description:
This is a game for people who want to play smash, but don't really want to learn how to play smash. Requires up to four controllers to be plugged in before opening the game.

D-Pad: navigate menu

A: jump

X: dash

Y: throw sword

RB/RT: Attack

LB/LT: Block

Throwing your sword means you can't block or attack until you go pick it up. All swords can be picked up, even your enemy's sword.

There are some other things that you can do in this game, but I'll never tell.
